website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung NX200's photo quality stands out from the crowd, but its performance and features -- while good -- don't merit its relatively high price.
pros: With excellent photos for a sub-$1,000 model and a nicely designed user interface, the Samsung NX200 is a compelling option for image-first photographers
cons: For its price, the NX200 feels light on important features
it lacks an option for a viewfinder, and it cries out for an articulated LCD.
And while its shooting performance is fine, in-camera operations like playback and changing settings can get held up by image processing

website_summaries.verdict: A speedy mirrorless camera capable of grabbing sharp images and shooting in lower light, the Samsung NX200's high price is its biggest barrier.

customer_reviews.title: Shop around!
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this camera. I was excited about the hybrid mirrorless camera idea. Not your standard point and shoot rangefinder and not you traditional SLR. A nice in between. However, this product was a bit disappointing. The lens does not take sharp pictures. It gives a nice soft effect though, if that is what you are looking for. Also, this model does not have wifi or bluetooth capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: L. Torres

customer_reviews.title: it does take excellent photos, and as an older model it's fairly ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intent of using it for video, but the bitrates are too low to be a serious contender. I could have probably figured this out before I bought it, but didn't. Minus one star for the lack of a high-bitrate video option on this. That said, it does take excellent photos, and as an older model it's fairly inexpensive if you want to try out this form factor. The sensor is fantastic, and the screen is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Donkey

customer_reviews.title: purchased in 2015 and LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get into photography and my requirements for a camera were under 500$, mirror less, interchangeable lenses, at least 20mp, and needed to have the settings of a DSLR like ISO, aperture, shutter speed. Etc. And this package had it all and I got mine for 230$.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera. I bought it brand new from amazon with 200$ !!!! . I used it in my journey to istanbul .. it was very handy and works like a pro cam . I am happy with it .
customer_reviews.author: mundir

customer_reviews.title: great customer service & price
customer_reviews.text: I actually returned it. Decided I wanted the next step up! Impressed by it, so decided to order the NX300. great customer service & price!
customer_reviews.author: Martie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. The size is great. Not to big, but for a compact camera it takes great photos. Can't wait to get out and take photos after photos.The options are so easy to acess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: For my needs what i bought it for it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: NX200 review
customer_reviews.text: This camera delivers excellent quality photos overall. At a price below USD 400 it is a value for money item.
customer_reviews.author: Sotirios KARPOUZIS

customer_reviews.title: I'am very disappointed with this Amazon purchase that I want to QUIT ...
customer_reviews.text: My camera store dealer said that this was A repackaged camera because my Samsung NX200 freezes up and I can not take A picture and the lens has A minor flaw on front . I'am very disappointed with this Amazon purchase that I want to QUIT AMAZON COMPLETLY Wow this camera is dead weight
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Trentacoste

customer_reviews.title: One charge lasts the whole day and it is very good for sightseeing and other day trips
customer_reviews.text: This camera does everything you need it to do and it is very energy efficient. One charge lasts the whole day and it is very good for sightseeing and other day trips. The Low ISO came in very handy at museums that did not allow flash photography, while everyone was putting away their cameras I was able to snap away.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Kommineni

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great and has all the bells and whistles you need to get into photography. My only disappointment was that Samsung seemed remove this camera from their lineup and it does not support a shutter release.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Wendorf

customer_reviews.title: Update ROM
customer_reviews.text: I'm not professional, often i used i-function or smart, firstly bought I got very bad pictures, the focus is not clear, but after updated ROM to 1.02 the image become perfect clearly and color also perfect.
customer_reviews.author: starjw

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Clear pictures with the kit lens, very low noise till ISO 3200 and THE BEST user interface I've ever used on this size of camera. For $600 it's hard to find anything better.I shoot RAW and really don't have any problems with the camera writing speed.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Isaac

product_meta.title: Samsung NX200
product_meta.description: See the world in 20.3 Megapixels Until now, photographers had to choose between the highest performance levels and ease of use. Samsung's long anticipated NX200 renders that decision obsolete, unleashing the professional photographer inside us all. Thanks to a 20.3 Megapixels APS-C CMOS Sensor, the NX200 delivers images that will satisfy even the most discerning eye. Just as importantly, the camera's innovative features and design make those images easier than ever to capture. Expert Image Quality Capture every moment in true-to-life quality. With the best-in-class resolution of the extra large 20.3 MP APS-C CMOS sensor, shots are rich, deep and exquisitely detailed. For active subjects, stills can be captured beautifully with 7fps Continuous Shot/100ms AF Speed. Then review your shot on the large 3.0” AMOLED display—made for sharper images and glare reduction. Expert Image Quality Capture every moment in true-to-life quality. With the best-in-class resolution of the extra large 20.3 MP APS-C CMOS sensor, shots are rich, deep and exquisitely detailed. For active subjects, stills can be captured beautifully with 7fps Continuous Shot/100ms AF Speed. Then review your shot on the large 3.0” AMOLED display—made for sharper images and glare reduction. Beat the Action Capture the perfect picture, no matter the speed of the subject. High Speed Capture can take sequential pictures at 7fps, so keeping up with the action also means unparalleled images. And the all-new autofocus algorithm makes it simple to get those rich, high-quality shots in an instant. Perfect In Any Light Take photos in any light at any speed—and get the shot. The NX200 can shoot high as 12800 ISO at normal settings, so even in low light, high-speed photos minimal noise and blurring. Or expand the range to maximize the potential of available light, for natural-looking images indoors or at night.
feature_bullets: Included Accessories - SEF-8A Flash Unit, 18-55mm f3.5-5.6 OIS Lens, BP1030 Battery, BC1030 Battery Charger, Battery Charger Power Cable, Camera Strap, User Manual, Software CDFeatures
The 20.3 Megapixels APS-C CMOS Sensor complements NX200's mirrorless lens system perfectly
Get the full picture with the thin and light 3.0 VGA AMOLED display
An interchangeable lens system packed into a light-weight, compact body
Captures fast-moving subjects with the 7 fps Continuous Shot/100ms AF speed
